extendedInfo.description: * Android fantasy MMO *Choose among three powerful races and build the strongest army in the Phoenix Empire!Engage in battles and quest your way through the Champions. As you unfold the story of the Emperor, come together with thousands to defeat the dark forces.What players are saying: - "Fun! This game is much better than the storm8, more involving and with lots of ways to play. Developers are very active making the game better and better. Give it a try!" - "Whoa! This game is so much better then haypi kingdom. Im waiting for an other event. Holloween is super fantastic!" - "This is the best game on Android market !! Everyone should play!! It's GREAT AND ADDITIVE.!!" - "Best overall game in market.	Active players and developers. Fantastic MMORPG that focuses more on strategy than the size of your wallet. Money can speed things up but doesn't beat out good strategy."Join Phoenix Emperor now, and Choose Your Destiny!

reviews.title: Okay but better games out there
reviews.comment: Been playing for about 4 months now.  Game is okay fun but some of the game dynamics seem off.  There are many pure attack farmers at all levels and the amount of gold they can take from you per hit is way high.  Say if your dont log in for 24 hours all you will have left is maybe 3-4 hours worth of income.  The rest will have been farmed from you.  There is also a tavern in the game to sell looted equipment which means the money spenders will have an advantage. Roman Empire or Spartan wars is better imho
reviews.author: John S

reviews.title: Good but needs improvement
reviews.comment: This game has balance issues if you don\'t spend real money you get crushed in battles,Hourly income is very hard to get you spend billions to make a few million profanty and bullying is a problem and getting worse

reviews.title: Best overall game in market.
reviews.comment: Active players and developers. Fantastic MMORPG that focuses more on strategy than the size of your wallet. Money can speed things up but doesn\'t beat out good strategy. Use referral code 21FD16 and get an early boost.

reviews.title: I don\'t know what they are talking about
reviews.comment: Some people are reviewing saying that if you don\'t pay real money you are at a disadvantage,  lose often and other things of that nature.  That is quite simply UNTRUE. You can not buy anything that gives you an advantage over others. That being said its a good game with a good community and has some very good updates coming soon. Enjoy!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Time Waster
reviews.comment: By far the best game on the market. Great for killing time, a very active player base, and many different ways to play! If you are interested in help when you start, use the referral code 1cb31e and then add that account to your army! Give it a try! You won\'t be disappointed!
